item.title: PSTG
item.description: score:231 Chances: Pure Storage is delivering innovative and disruptive data storage products and services. The company is leveraging subscription-based models to deliver value-added services in Latin America. The proliferation of 5G technology has been a positive catalyst for computer networking stocks, which could benefit Pure Storage.
